sentence: Casey Wardynski, Republican candidate for Alabama’s open fifth congressional district seat, on Monday announced that his campaign had landed the endorsement of U.S. Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio).
author: Dylan Smith
title: U.S. Rep. Jim Jordan endorses AL-5 hopeful Casey Wardynski — ‘He is just the kind of fighter we need’

sentence: “Well, that didn’t happen, so now the United States can look into it when the Republicans take over and have a special counsel to get to the bottom of it.” The candidate was joined by U.S. Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) during the interview, who endorsed Wardynski earlier this week.
author: Yaffee
title: AL-5 candidate Casey Wardynski: We need a ‘special counsel to get to the bottom of’ Hunter Biden’s emails

sentence: “Congressmen like Jim Jordan, Scott Perry, and others in the Freedom Caucus need conservative fighters to work with them in the House, and they know that Casey Wardynski is the only candidate in this race that will stand with them and further an America First agenda.” “The Freedom Fund endorsement is highly sought after, and we’re glad that after thoroughly vetting the AL-5 field they recognized Casey Wardynski as the true conservative in the race,” he added.
author: Dylan Smith
title: House Freedom Caucus political arm endorses Casey Wardynski in AL-5 race
